hint.text: First rearrange the terms in the dividend and divisor in order of degree and look for any common values.

solution.text:
Perform long division method to find the quotient and remainder as shown above :
Therefore, you must subtract \((9-12a)\,\) from \(6a^3+16a^2-2a+13\,\) so that the resulting polynomial is divisible by \(3a^2+2a+1\).

content.text: What must be subtracted from \(6a^3+16a^2-2a+13\,\) so that the resulting polynomial is divisible by \(3a^2+2a+1\).
